transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hanji

Customer: Ji mam main Anisha bol rahi hu main

Executive: Ji bataiye

Customer: Maine India mart ka subscription liya hua hai

Executive: Ji

Customer: But meri ek aur id hai jo shayad main abhi use nahi kar rahi hu

Executive: Kya nahi kar rahi aap log koi bhi customer ka aap log registration le lete ho without verification

Executive: Nahi aisa to nahi hai mam without verification

Customer: Mere pass ek email aayi hai

Executive: Ji bataiye aap number batao main aapke number pe share karti hu you read that language

Executive: Main aapke account manager aap part enterprises se baat kar rahi hai na

Customer: Han hanji

Executive: Ek second

Executive: Main aapko message drop kar rahi hu main aapke account manager hi baat kar rahi hu Manju

Customer: Achcha achcha

Executive: Ji

Customer: Main bhejti hu email mam par na uski language matlab main to only aise bata nahi sakti hu

Customer: Kya mam kuch bhi naam se id agar ban ja raha hai to wo to at least dekhna chahiye na

Customer: Matlab aapki team ko dekhna chahiye tabhi to

Executive: Basically kya rehta hai customer waha pe jo number provide karta hai na apna

Customer: Hmm hmm

Executive: To verification kafi tarike se hota hai kai bari whatsapp pe bhi verification hota hai mam ho sakta hai uska whatsapp number chalu ho us number se aap usko whatsapp pe ek bar connect karke dekhiye aapke pass agar number hai to
Customer: Mam kyun matlab ki karne mein are mam mere pass ek personally email id hai jo meri apni khud ki hai mere naam se usse bhi id india mart ki bani hui hai aapke salesman ne kya kiya tha jis din subscription lena tha unhone pata nahi kya hera pheri ki account close kiya band kiya fir karwaya i don't know kya unhone kiya dusre id se ye subscription lena pada aur ye chal raha hai wo wali mujhe hatana pada kyuki ek hi ek hi se to insan deal karega dusre wale but meri personal email pe india mart ki inquiry aayi hai mam ya to fir us id ko aap log band kar dijiye

Executive: Aapka FCP create hua hoga mam free account hota hai wo create hua hoga to wo waha pe aapne apna personal ha to waha pe aapne apna personal mail id diya hoga aap waha pe aap ek minute waha pe kya hai kisi buyer ne aapka profile dekha hoga to usne ho sakta hai waha pe aapko inquiry kara ho to isliye aapke pass aapke personal mail id pe account mujhe delete karwana mam aap ye kaise delete hoga

Customer: Kaise account aapko delete karwana hai

Customer: Kyun ha main aap apna number bataiye mujhe whatsapp karo eight two

Executive: Ek second rukiye

Executive: Eight two

Customer: 713 ha 78

Customer: 713

Executive: 713

Customer: 45

Executive: Hmm

Customer: 960 hmm

Customer: Whatsapp karo main wo email aapko bhej deti hu aap khud padh lena aur actually mein mujhe apni id wo jo personal wali id hai usko delete karwani hai

Executive: Jo jispe aapka personal mail id pada hua hai na

Customer: Ha jo jis usse mera account bana hua hai i want to delete that aap waha se apna mail id remove kar sakti hai waha se

Customer: Nahi to remove kar sakte hai to dusri to dalni padegi na phone number to nahi dalni padegi

Customer: Madam phone number dal phone number delete karne ka option hai account delete karne ka option to hoga na india account delete karne ka bhi option account delete karne ka bhi account waise mam aise delete hota nahi hai dekhiye wo FCP account hai aap pehle mujhe screenshot bheji jo bhej rahe the aap main ek bar dekh ke tab bataungi aapko whatsapp pe maine aapko message kiya hai ha message kiya hai aapko

Customer: Okay ek second

Customer: Mam aap khud hi mann mein padh lena agar padha jaye to padh sakte ho aap main bhejti hu aapko ek second

Customer: Aise logo ko india mart se hata dena chahiye na jo friends sirf language use kare

Customer: Aap ye regards wala mam part padhna ye gali hai ye ek type ka matlab hamare agar bihar

Customer: Hello

Executive: Hanji ye aapne likha hai dear Anisha Jaiswal i come across your company regards padhna regards wala jo line hai na regards ke niche wo aap khud padh ke understand it's a ye na ek bahut gandi gali hai mam

Customer: Hamari language mein bihari language mein ye matlab ki bahut gandi gali hai

Executive: Achcha

Customer: Hmm wo usko shayad agar aap matlab ki UP se hogi to shayad isko regret kar pao UP se nahi hogi hogi to

Customer: To okay aap fir nahi samajh mein aayega aapko

Customer: Ye bahut gandi gali hai non veg is non veg gali isko bol sakte hai aap samajh sakte hai

Customer: To ye aapko message aaya hai ye aapki personal us pe aaya hai ha email id pe aaya hai

Executive: Achcha

Customer: Main wo bhi bhej personal email id pe aaya hai aapko wo bhi bhej do ek bar isse to contact aap log to un logo ko verify kar sakte ho ya is candidate ko wo kar sakte ho

Customer: Aise non veg gali matlab regards likhne ka koi matlab hi nahi banta hai mam

Executive: Mam wo pata nahi ye sab i don't know ye unhone aapko direct inquiry kiya hai yani aapki profile pe ja kar ke directly aapko message bheja hai isliye nahi hai

Executive: Ha is tarike ki nahi koi bhi matlab hamare india mart mein aap dekho koi product ka bhi naam hota hai to usko bhi reject kar diya jata hai ye to aap ki baat kar rahi hai nahi hai ye directly usne aapke profile ko open karke aur tab aapko bheja hua hai ye

Customer: To fir wahi wahi keh rahi hu na mam ye to mujhe apna account delete karwana hai personal wale aur aise mam non veg aapka koi bhi account mam aapke india mart pe kisi person mam actually isme na dekho main aapko main aapko screen meri nahi ruko aapko screen ek bar mera koi bhi kisi ne bhi x y z person ne free account create kiya ho ya fake kiya ho theek hai aapke pass har ek person ka data hai main kisi ko galat mail karu free account se karu ya paid account se karu theek hai wo kahi na kahi ek india mart ka hi channel use ho raha hai aap meri baat dhyan se sunna mujhe mail aaya unpaid account hai naam kahan se aaya india mart se channel india mart hi hai na to main sabse pehle aapko hi pakdungi to mam aise type karke type kiya ho kaise bhi kiya ho kaise bhi kiya ho mam mail to main to aapko hi bolungi aapke pass iska contact information sab kuch maine is person ko share kar diya aap log dekho isko kya karna hai kya nahi karna hai aap khud agar aapko wo gali nahi pad jati aur bhi koi employee honge bihar ke unse wo read karwa lena mam maine na aapko maine na wo jo number tha na usme maine wo number yaha search kara hai aur us number ke baad na inki company open ho gayi hai theek hai aap ek bar iska jo screenshot aapko bheja hai aap wo open karke dekhiye waha par jo contact person ka naam hai na wo naam hi wahi likha hua hai theek hai jo usne aapko regards mein likha hai to wo naam hi wahi matlab us person ne apna contact person mein hi ye naam dala hua hai ya to wo i think wo illiterate person hai usko itna jankari nahi hai ki kya likhna hai kya nahi likhna hai usne personally matlab illiterate person mam dekho kai bari kya hota hai aapko idea nahi hoga shayad hum log bahut sare account handle karte hain hamare pass har tarike ka customer aata hai theek hai kai bari bahut sare customers ko aisa bhi hota hai ki mam unko video meeting bhi join karna nahi aata ya unko nahi aati hai bahut sari cheeze to hum log guide karte hai unko ab ye bhi account jo hai aap meri baat to suno ye account jo hai ye FCP account hai koi paid account nahi hai iska kahi pe koi promotion nahi hai isne aapka account aapka jo mail id hai pata nahi kahan se dekha hai but uska contact person ka naam wahi hai isliye uska regard mein wahi cheez aayi hai theek hai usne personally aap log block nahi kar sakte ho kya mam mujhe nahi hazar customer ko kya pata usne bheja ho kisi ne dhyan nahi diya ho

Executive: Ho sakta hai usne aur aur bhi bheja ho but main aapko jo aapka doubt hai na wo jo regards mein usne likha hai main wahi ha wo wo main samajh gayi wo is name se usne banaya hai usne login is number se kiya aur naam se kiya hua hai apna to isliye wo waha pe aaya hai but ha theek hai main unka account main unka account main close nahi kar sakti hu matlab unka account already FCP hai aapka jo aap bol rahi hai ki meri mail id waha pe dali hui hai wo to wo to main aap se delete karwa lungi account wo jab main aap log usko personal email warning bhi to de sakte ho na

Executive: Kya kya de sakte hai warning warning issue kara denge mam restrict kar denge account ko main mail dal dungi uske against mein ki ye naam unhone bahut galat dala hua hai aur usi se wo message kar rahe hain sabko ab ab ha isko cheez ko matlab ki aap usko restrict kara sakte ho ya warning de sakte ho whatsapp pe bhi hazar tarike ke message aate hain number kahi se bhi check kar milta ho hame pasand nahi hota hai to waha pe option hote hai report karo ya spam me dalo ya aap isko block aap isko block kar do aapke pass block karne ka option hoga inquiries mein ja kar ke aap isko matlab india mart app main chala nahi rahi hu jab se maine paid liya hua hai aap meri baat suniye main abhi shayad aapka shayad office time bhi khatam hua hoga kal main free hoke phone karungi mujhe mera account jo personal wala hai usko close karwa dena aur is bande ko ek warning email dal do ya restrict kar do i want to theek hai wo main mail dal dungi inka mail id agar yaha par hoga ek bar main check kar leti hu aapko mam inhone na apna GST bhi submit nahi kiya hua hai matlab aap dekho kuch bhi inhone nahi diya hua hai

Customer: Bas fir inko restrict karo aap khud hi dekh rahe ho matlab naam bhi wahi rakha hai fir kaise mentality hogi

Customer: Isko rokne mein hamari daily baat chit mein antar hota hai na ek professional side pe kaise baat hota hai aur aise kaise baat hota hai

Executive: Koi baat nahi inka number hai na yaha pe inka number hai yaha pe inse baat karenge phone se ki aap apna naam yaha se change kijiye

Customer: Hmm nahi to wo JD wala mere pass option hai main yaha se yaha se inka naam change kar deti hu inka naam kuch aur dal deti hu inka naam bhi to nahi pata hai kya hai

Executive: Un user dal deti hu

Customer: Itni food chala rahe hain mujhe aap restrict kyun nahi kar dete mujhe ye nahi samajh mein aa raha hai

Customer: Chalo theek hai already already already already wo account jo hai wo hi hai

Customer: Aaj active email aaya mam

Executive: Email aaya hai

Executive: Account mein mam kuch bhi add nahi hai product bhi add nahi hai

Executive: Koi ek product add nahi hai

Customer: Chalo aap dekh lo aapko jo karna hai karo dobara email aayega agar is type se agar aa gaya mere pass to fir mujhe kuch karna hoga

Executive: Ha main iske liye mail dal deti hu theek hai

Executive: Aur baki jo aap bol rahi thi aapka account hai uske liye main ek bar kal connect kar lungi aap se ha ha mam abhi matlab time taking hai aapka bhi office cover ho gaya hoga to kal kar lungi to ye jo concern concern aapke tha 96 ka wo kuch bhi problem hua kare aap directly mere ko call kar liya karo mam

Customer: Matlab mujhe na shayad aapka number save nahi hai aur maine achanak se email khola bhi nahi kaise padh ke hi aise dimag hack ho gaya hai main phone karke puchti hu ki kya scene hai koi baat nahi ab main ye concern close kar dungi aapka jo aap 9696 pe call ki thi

Executive: Theek hai

Customer: Okay mam thank you
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received abusive email via IndiaMART.

- Wants personal account deleted.

- Wants action against the sender.



Resolution:

- Executive assured action against the sender.

- Executive will check and assist with account deletion.

- Executive will call the sender to change name.

- Executive changed the sender's name to 'Unuser'.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect with customer next day.



Alert (If Any):

abuse

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- abusive email, account deletion, restriction, warning
